sentences.sContent: Denisov, in a long cape and a high fur cap, both streaming with water, was riding a thin, pinched - looking, thoroughbred horse.
sentences.sContent_eng: Denisov, in a long cape and a high fur cap, both streaming with water, was riding a thin, pinched - looking, thoroughbred horse.
sentences.sCn: 杰尼索夫骑在一匹精瘦两肋下陷的良种马上，雨水从他戴的羊皮帽和披的毡斗篷上流淌下来。

synos.tran: 良种的；受过严格训练的；优秀的

remMethod.val: thorough (完全的， 彻底的) + bred (繁殖) → 纯种的
